name: L'Ermeneuta, Personale
description:
L'Ermeneuta, Personale

This is a virtual 3d experience where my artistic production from 2018 to 2020 is collected, impersonating the alter ego of the Hermeneut.

The space is inspired by some Venetian exhibition buildings such as Punta della Dogana or the Ex Magazzini del Sale.

I tried to make everything as faithful as possible, keeping all the elements present in the real exhibition spaces trying to give you an experience as similar to reality as possible.

At the beginning of the expo you will find a QR code that lead to the page on my website of this cycle of artworks, scan it if you want to know more about each piece.

And now sit back, relax and enjoy the show!
